Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

COLLEGE: Transferred to UNA from Southeastern Louisiana University… In 2020-21 he played in seven games and made five starts in the secondary … Fourth on the team with 34 tackles (24 solo) … Also credited with an interception, a pass breakup, a forced fumble, a sack and four tackles for loss … Made a season-high eight tackles and a tackle for loss at Sam Houston … Intercepted a pass, recorded six tackles and a tackle for loss in 27-24 win over Northwestern State … Forced a fumble to go with six tackles and a tackle for loss to help Lions to a 42-12 victory over Lamar … Posted six tackles and a pass breakup at UIW … Recorded a sack in 25-20 win over McNeese…2019: Played in 12 games as a reserve defensive back and special teams contributor … Finished with 11 tackles (five solo) … Blocked a punt that set up a touchdown in a 35-14 win over Abilene Christian … Recorded four tackles in 52-13 win at Houston Baptist … Made two stops in 45-44 FCS playoff victory over No. 8 Villanova … Recorded tackles versus Jacksonville State, Northwestern State, UIW, Stephen F. Austin and Montana…HIGH SCHOOL: Played as a defensive back, wide receiver and running back under head coach Wayne Dabbs at Mount Vernon Presbyterian High School…Named Class 1A All-State in 2018…Also lettered in basketball and track…PERSONAL: Born December 21, 2000…Son of Edmond and Pamela Douglas and has five siblings…Major is Sports Management
